descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]\ Why cannot I equip this Bucket, Pot, Kettle? /

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80123-0-1478794465.jpg[/img]

You can equip some Misc Item as Weapon and Helmet by this MOD. :)

I respected[b] [/b][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9884/?]Handyman[/url] [/b]very much.
I want this mod to be used with[b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9884/?]Handyman[/url][/b].

[color=#ffff00]Attention :[/color] This MOD replace all the objects placed in the world.
If you don't want to replace, please use the [color=#00ff00]craft only version[/color].

[/size][/center][size=5][center]---- Replace Misc. Item List ----[/center][/size]
[size=4][center][color=#ff0000]Helmet[/color]
Basket 1,2,3,4,5,6
Bucket 1,2
Cast Iron Pot (medium)
Dwemer Pot & Urn
Glazed Pot 1,2 & Urn
Nordic pot 1,2
Kettle

[color=#ff0000]Shield[/color]
Glazed Jug (Large)
Glazed Pottery Jug
Nordic Jug (Large)

[color=#ff0000]Weapon[/color]
Cast Iron Pot (small)
Dwemer Cup
Dwemer Pan
Glazed Jug (small)
Nordic Jug (small)
Saw
Ship Oar
Silver Jug[/center][/size]
author: Diode

files.name: Equipable Misc Item
files.changelogHtml:
Added crafting racipes & Create craft only version
Added Dwemer Pot&Urn, Glazed Urn, as a Helmet
Added Ship Oar as a Weapon
